text: Steve Davisson (1957/1958 â€“ September 19, 2021) was an American politician and pharmacist. He was born in Salem, Indiana. He was a Republican member of the Indiana House of Representatives from 2010 until his death in 2021. Davisson died on September 19, 2021 from cancer in Salem at the age of 63. ==References== Category:1950s births Category:2021 deaths Category:Members of the Indiana General Assembly Category:Politicians from Indiana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Cancer deaths in Indiana
title: Steve Davisson
